result.name: goodwin-sands-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
Two surveys of Fulmar rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015): 
Cruise: ITT_flmr_28_2012 Date: 20th March - 29th March 2012 Data collected: MB 
Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 2 x Blocks MB Backscatter Coverage 
(Contractor): 2 x Blocks SS Coverage: None acquired to date Video and Stills 
Samples to date: None acquired to date PSA Samples to date: None acquired to 
date Infauna Samples to date: None acquired to date Cruise: Cefas_cend0812 
Date: 6th May - 10th May 2012 Data collected: MB Bathymetry Coverage 
(Contractor): Transits MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Transits SS 
Coverage: None acquired to date Video and Stills Samples to date: 25 video 
transects; 326 stills analysed - Usable PSA Samples to date: 66 Infauna 
Samples to date: 66
